subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Halep’s match against Victoria Azarenka was delayed during the third set, allowing her to refocus and advance to the U.S. Open semifinals for the first time. Pennetta beat Petra Kvitova.
snippet: Halep’s match against Victoria Azarenka was delayed during the third set, allowing her to refocus and advance to the U.S. Open semifinals for the first time. Pennetta beat Petra Kvitova.
